sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { useSelector,useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Breadcrumb } from "react-bootstrap"; import TicketTable from '../../components/ticket-table/TicketTable.comp'; import tickets from '../../assets/data/dummy-tickets.json' import PageBreadcrumb from '../../components/breadcrumb/Breadcrumb.comp'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {fetchAllTickets} from "../ticket-list/ticketsAction" const Dashboard = () => { const {tickets}=useSelector(state=>state.tickets) const dispatch=useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ if(!tickets.length){ dispatch(fetchAllTickets()) } },[tickets,dispatch]) const pendingTickets=tickets.filter(row=>row.status !=="Closed") return (
Total Tickets:50
Pending Tickets:5
 Recently Added tickets
) } export default Dashboard
